description: Structural general notes page covering statement of special inspection, design criteria (seismic and wind), concrete specifications, reinforcement requirements with rebar cover table, and general construction notes. Dense text-based reference sheet.
key_content: Seismic design: Ss = 1.618, S1 = 0.618, SDS = 1.405, Seismic Design Category D, Site Class D
Seismic importance factor: p = 1.3, Occupancy II
Floor live load: 40 PSF, Roof live load: 20 PSF
Concrete: 2,500 PSI, W/C ratio 0.65, normal weight, Type V Portland Cement (ASTM C-150)
Non-shrink grout: 7,000 PSI minimum compressive strength at 28 days
Rebar: ASTM A-615 Grade 60, smooth dowels ASTM A-36 (36 KSI)
Rebar cover: footings against earth 3", exposed to weather #6+ = 2", #5 and smaller = 1-1/2", other = 3/4"
Lap splices: Class B unless noted otherwise
Special inspection required: reinforced concrete (CBC 1705.3), wood shearwall (CBC 1705.12), epoxy dowels (CBC 1705.13), soil condition (CBC 1705)
All footings: min 12" top of current adjacent grade, min 12" native soil
NOT SHOWN: lumber species and grade specification (deferred to SN2)
NOT SHOWN: nailing schedule (deferred to SN2)

drawing_zones.content: Statement of Special Inspection (table + notes) and Design Criteria (seismic + wind)
Concrete specifications (strength table, cement type, aggregates) and Reinforcement requirements (rebar grade, cover table, splices)
General construction notes (15 items covering code compliance, excavation, backfill, utilities)
